attributes.additional_details: Due to the recent problems that were caused at the 2023 Remembrance Week End I am asking the Government and Parliament to back my petition to clearly state that no Demonstrations/Protests to be allowed on this weekend including Armistice Day and those held by other Religions on different days
attributes.background: Ban All Demonstrations/Protests on Remembrance weekend and Armistice Day so that Parades can go ahead unhindered

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prohibit all protests and political marches on Armistice Day/Remembrance Sunday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650600

Make it illegal to have public protests on days of celebration and remembrance: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651072
